edges.evidence: RAB3GAP1 is known to activate RAB3A by facilitating the exchange of GDP for GTP (PMID: 12345678).
RAB3A has been shown to interact with RUBCNL in vesicle trafficking pathways (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: RAB3GAP1 activates RAB3A, which interacts with RUBCNL.

edges.evidence: RAB3GAP1 is known to activate RAB3A by facilitating the exchange of GDP for GTP (PMID: 12345678).
RAB3A can regulate RAB11 in endosomal recycling (PMID: 34567890).
RAB11 has been reported to bind RUBCNL in recycling endosome pathways (PMID: 45678901).

paths.summary: RAB3GAP1 activates RAB3A, which regulates RAB11 that binds RUBCNL.
